material_skill.name: 反哺

material_skill.name: 硬化
material_skill.desc: 减少所受的任何伤害

material_skill.name: 魔力咒文

material_skill.name: 粘液屏障

material_skill.name: 撕裂

material_skill.name: 再生细胞
